text: Petr Hladík (born 28 September 1984) is a Czech politician and deputy chairman of the Christian and Democratic Union – Czechoslovak People's Party (KDU-ČSL) since March 2019. In 2012–2015 he served as chairman of the Young Populars. Since 2016 he is elected as deputy mayor of Brno. He was elected as deputy leader in 2019 Christian and Democratic Union – Czechoslovak People's Party leadership election. He is member in communal council of Brno.https://www.brno.cz/sprava-mesta/volene-organy-mesta/namestci-primatorky- mesta-brna/ == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Žďár nad Sázavou District Category:KDU-ČSL politicians
title: Petr Hladík (politician)
